org.grouplens.lenskit.cursors

Class AbstractCursor<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.cursors.AbstractCursor<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of value returned by this cursor.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Iterable<T>, Cursor<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractPollingCursor, DelimitedTextCursor, GroupingCursor

    public abstract class AbstractCursor<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Cursor<T>
    Base class to make Cursors easier to implement.
    Compatibility
    Public

    • Method Detail

      • getRowCount

        public int getRowCount()
        Description copied from interface: Cursor
        Get an upper bound on the number of rows available from the cursor.
        Specified by:
        getRowCount in interface Cursor<T>
        Returns:
        the maximum number of rows which may be returned by Cursor.next(), or -1 if that count is not available.

      • iterator

        public java.util.Iterator<T> iterator()
        Get the iterator. This method just returns this, so for-each loops can be used over cursors.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
